Pre-Game Insights: France participated in Euro 2024 this summer but stopped in the semifinals, being eliminated by the winner of the competition, Spain, score 2-1.
Italy also participated in Euro 2024 but had an evolution below expectations even though it was the European champion en-titre.
France won the UEFA Nations trophy after defeating Spain in the final with 2-1 in 2021-2021.
Luciano Spalletti was reconfirmed as coach and hopes to qualify the national team for the 2026 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two national teams are facing each other for the first time in this competition and the last official match was at Euro 2008, when Italy won 2-0 against France and qualified further in 2nd place while France finished the group in the last position.
Both teams participated this year in Euro 2024 where they managed to get out of the groups.
The most recent confrontation took place in a friendly in 2018, which France won 3-1 at home in Nice.
